articles.description: Cameron Smith, eyeing the No. 1 ranking, is 2 shots behind J.J. Spaun for the lead in the FedEx St. Jude Championship.
articles.content:
MEMPHIS, Tenn. -- J.J. Spaun did just enough right at the end to fashion a 2-under 68 and keep his 1-shot lead Saturday in the FedEx St. Jude Championship with a familiar name lurking.

articles.title: NFLPA president calls for league 'to re-evaluate what is an acceptable surface' after preseason opener in Chicago

CHICAGO -- The playing surface at Soldier Field was the subject of criticism throughout the Bears' 19-14 preseason win over the Kansas City Chiefs on Saturday.

articles.description: Jets quarterback Zach Wilson has a bone bruise and a meniscus tear in his right knee and is set to miss two to four weeks, a source confirmed to ESPN.
